Desc_EN: Fight against the Guardian Twins simultaneously and emerge victorious.
Pet the cat.
Acquire Pyrana's Love.
Use Legendary Chaos a total of 5 times.
Defeat 30 enemies in a row while your Health is below 40%.
Deal 1,500 or more damage in a single hit.
Defeat enemies affected by all 4 elements 70 times.
Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times in total.
Deliver a total of 50 finishing blows to Soul Swordsmen using basic attacks.
Defeat Heroic Bosses 8 times while your Health is below 25%.
Defeat the Snowy Mountain King while having 4 Cold damage Memories.
During a single adventure, let your Health fall below 40% and then bring it back up to at least 75% 10 times.
Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Memories of the same type.
In a single adventure, visit locations occupied by Hunters 4 times while having a Hunt Threat Level of 5.
Reach 3,000 Maximum Health.
Empower Memories that deal Dark damage 20 times in a single adventure.
Have 4 Active Memories at once that can Stun, Root, or Knockback.
Survive a single hit that deals 70% or more of your Maximum Health while you have no Barrier.
Activate the Shrine of Guidance 15 times in a single adventure.
Have 4 Active Memories at once with a cooldown of 3 seconds or less.
Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Active Light Attribute Memories.
Possess 6,000 Gold.
Destroy 3 Pitch-Black Ore.
Open a treasure chest for the first time.
Enter the Pure White Dream while having cast only one type of Memory during a single adventure.
Apply buffs to allies other than yourself a total of 200 times.
Apply a total of 3,000 Fire stacks to enemies.
Defeat 250 burning enemies.
Activate the Shrine of Dismantling 12 times.
Defeat an enemy while they have 30 or more Fire stacks.
Mitigate a total of 20,000 damage from enemies using Barriers.
Land 80 finishing blows on enemies from an extreme distance.
Take the Merchant's unattended backpack 12 times.
Have 4 healing Active Memories at once.
Spend a total of 2,000 Gold.
Defeat the Demon of the Forest by clawing it.
Gain a Barrier equal to or greater than 300% of your Maximum Health.
Land a finishing blow on Thunder Tigers with lightning 25 times.
Acquire Unique Memories or Essences from Heroic Bosses 8 times.
Land a total of 1,000 critical strikes.
Reach 6 Attack Speed per second.
Fully heal an allied Traveler below 30% Health within 1 seconds.
Cast 12 Memories within 8 seconds.
Defeat 70 Hunters.
Defeat 10 Heroic Bosses as Aurena.
Heal yourself or allies for a total of 25,000 Health.
Cast Golden Explosion 9 times within 5 seconds as Aurena.
As Aurena, fully restore your Health in one use of Dangerous Theory when your Health is below 40%.
Deal a total of 250,000 Dark damage to enemies as Bismuth.
Defeat a Heroic Boss without taking any damage as Bismuth.
Enter the Pure White Dream as Bismuth.
Keep any Traveler's Movement Speed above 900 for 3 seconds.
Breathe life into the wooden doll.
Reach 120 Attack Damage with Lacerta.
Defeat the Heroic Boss 5 times as Lacerta.
Defeat the Heroic Boss with 85% or more Health remaining as Lacerta.
Defeat 60 enemies in a row without taking damage as Mist.
Defeat any elemental 75 times as Mist.
Defeat Belphomet within 2 minutes of starting an adventure as Mist.
Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times as Nachia.
As Nachia, defeat the Demon of the Forest within 6 seconds after dealing the first damage.
As Nachia, defeat a Guardian of Impermanence without taking any damage.

Name_EN: The True Ruler of the Forest
Desc_EN: Defeat the Demon of the Forest 12 times.
Defeat the Burning Giant as Vesper while holding 3 or more Fire Memories.
Perform 9 basic attacks within 5 seconds using Vesper.
Have 3 Dash or Teleport Memories at once as Vesper.
Reach the Starry Dream.
Reach 140 Ability Power with Yubar.
Reach 55 Attack Damage with Yubar.
Deal a total of 400,000 Light damage to enemies as Yubar.
Acquire a total of 450 Dream Dust.
Enter the Pure White Dream 2 time(s) without receiving or granting any shields.
Get cursed 6 times in a single adventure.
Get cursed a total of 3 times in World 5 or beyond.
Visit 12 rooms occupied by Hunters in a single adventure.
Enter the Pure White Dream 3 times without slaying any Hunters.
Complete the Forest of Turbulence without taking any damage from enemies.
Land a finishing blow on 16 or more enemies with a single Memory cast.
Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times without using the Shrine of Guidance.
Enter a new location 12 times while your health is at or below 40% in a single run.
Enter the Pure White Dream on Nightmare difficulty.
Scare or defeat the Merchant 20 times.
Enter Pure White Dream with 4 active Memories that have a cooldown of 6 seconds or longer.
